text: Moroz Vasyl Maxymovych (born February 2, 1942, Ozero, Ukraine) is a ... == Biography == He was born on February 2, 1942 in the village of Ozera, Nemyriv district, Vinnytsia region, into a family of collective farmers. He graduated from Vinnytsia Medical Institute (1967, now Vinnytsia National Medical University. N. I. Pirogov), a physician. From 1967 to 1968 he worked as a therapist at the Shpykiv District Hospital in the Vinnytsia Region. Further activities associated with Vinnytsia National Medical University: assistant professor of normal physiology (1968-1969), graduate student of the same department (1969-1972), associate professor (1976-1984), professor (1984-1991), Head of department (1991-2015). From 1975 to 1982 - Academic Secretary of the Institute, 1982-1984 - Deputy Dean of the Faculty of Medicine, 1984-86 - Dean of the Faculty of Pediatrics, 1986-1988 - Vice-Rector for Academic Affairs,since 1988 - Rector, Vinnytsia National Medical University. N. I. Pirogov Since March 1990 - Member of the Vinnytsia Regional Council (Leninsky District 3, elected in the 1st round). 1992-1994 - Deputy Chairman, Vinnytsia Regional Council of People's Deputies. == Scientific achievements == Moroz Vasyl’ Maxymovych Authored more than 400 scientific papers, which includes 32 monographs and manuals and 35 inventions. Scientific research by MV Maxymovych includes : "Integrated function of the cerebellum of the basal ganglia and motor cortex in the programming and regulation of movements" (Institute of Physiology, ANU, 1983); "Electrophysiological studies of the representation and pathways of the auditory system in the cerebellar cortex" (Institute of Physiology, ANU, 1972). He is the author of the creation of the system virtual patient SKIF - a computer model of the human body (2013) and Author (co-author) of more than 225 scientific papers. == Awards == * The title of Hero of Ukraine with the Order of the State ( August 21, 2003 ) - for outstanding personal services to the Ukrainian state in training highly qualified health care professionals, many years of fruitful scientific, pedagogical and social activities * Order of Prince Yaroslav the Wise Fourth Class. ( May 18, 2017 ) - for a significant personal contribution to the development of domestic science, strengthening the scientific and technical potential of Ukraine, many years of hard work and high professionalism * Order of Prince Yaroslav the Wise Fifth Class. ( 2002 ) * Order of Merit III degree ( February 4, 1997 ) - for a significant personal contribution to the training of highly qualified specialists, many years of fruitful pedagogical and scientific activities * Honored Worker of Science and Technology of Ukraine ( 1993 ) * State Prize of Ukraine in Science and Technology in 2016 - for the work "Creation of tools and technologies for efferent therapy based on nanosilica" (as part of the team) * Diploma of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine (2003) * Diploma of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine ( January 29, 2002 ) - for many years of conscientious work, significant personal contribution to the development of medical science and education, training of highly qualified specialists and on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of his birth == References == == Links == * Довідник «Хто є хто в Україні», видавництво «К.
